Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price.
Reviews.Author: nikselegance
Reviews.Content: For the price that I paid, and for two sims, I think this is a great phone.  It was delivered on scheduled time and it fit my expectations.

Reviews.Title: It is a great phone !!!!
Reviews.Author: COTI CHAPO
Reviews.Content: This phone is great.I bought 2 phones for gift to my son and a friendThey are working without any problem.And I have just bought another one lately.Overall, it is a great phone with great quality.

Reviews.Title: great phone for features and price.
Reviews.Author: ERIC J FORT
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone so I'd have one while traveling.  The phone lists some impressive specs with bluetooth, dual sim, mp3 player, camera, full keypad, etc.  here's the good, bad, & ugly so to speak:bluetooth:  havn't tried don't knowkeypad:  nice to have as I do a lot of sms/texting but as others have commented it's on the small side, especially for those with larger fingers.  quite usable thoughmp3:  plays mp3 files from the card just fine but was disappointed that it WILL NOT DO MP3 RINGTONES.  that's actually most of what I use my phones mp3 library for is audio caller id.Dual SIM:  really nice as I can basically have 2 phones in one.all in all I'd recommend this phone.  just note it's limitations and verify that it's a good match for you.

Reviews.Title: Just a phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Deleted my old 3 star reviewEDIT 4/18/13Down to ONE star.This phone seemed fine and before I gave it to my daughter everything was working. She reports to me that she hasn't been able to send a text in over a month. I reloaded everything, swapped sims, tried both slots, reset the network information and it still will not send a text. So it's garbage.

Reviews.Title: bad battery
Reviews.Author: Gemma L.
Reviews.Content: I bought to two. One was great worked perfectly while after a month the second phone stopped charging then the battery swelled and all together d phone became useless.

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: K. Agee
Reviews.Content: I had a child (8yrs old) ask me if it was a toy. It is very light, so you would think it is a toy. Every time you take the battery out, you have to reprogram Date and Time. Does not store a lot of contacts, and text messages. Very junky and cheap phone. I've never hated anything as much as I hated this phone. I replaced it within 2 months.

Reviews.Title: Not a data phone
Reviews.Author: BMan
Reviews.Content: Works fine as a standard text/ voice call phone. However, it does not work with any of the data services it comes preinstalled with, such as Facebook. If you click on the facebook icon or the Blu club icon, it just takes you to a blank screen or a screen with writing on it that has nothing to do with facebook.Battery life is good for what it can be used for. Music player is functional with an added micro SD card, but navigation is pretty tricky and not user friendly.All in all it would be a great value if the data function worked properly. As it is, it's just another semi-decent phone that makes calls and texts.

Reviews.Title: Great second ie emergency phone
Reviews.Author: Mr. Granty
Reviews.Content: The phone is very basic and although it has configurations for WAP,  I am yet to have it configured correctly and connected.  The phone is sturdy and has great cell reception.  The dual Sim functionality works flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: It served its purpose.
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Parish Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my trip to Thailand. You can buy a SIM card, throw it in, and start using the phone. It texts and it makes calls. Get it for practical reasons because it's not a sophisticated piece of technology.

Reviews.Title: works great in Jamaica
Reviews.Author: The Captain "Livin' on a higher vibration"
Reviews.Content: Bought this ti bring to Jamaica...works great and love the dual sim card ability Jamaica also now carries batteries and accesory for this phine

Reviews.Title: I dont really use it
Reviews.Author: Yasya
Reviews.Content: its good. Its not bad. Its just so toy like. Besides the limited space for contacts is the worst issue for me.

Reviews.Title: Small Phone, texts fine, but struggles with calls
Reviews.Author: SpeedyAkron
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for three weeks now. I have AT&T; and the phone worked right away after putting in the SIM card without any issues. The phone does not auto sync the date and time with the network. I had to set the date/time myself.Positives1. This phone is the smallest lightest phone I have ever used. I hate large items in my pocket and love the small size. I have average sized hands (8" span) and haven't had any issues with the small keys. The keys have enough of a gap between them that I can hit the correct key without any issues every time.2. For a price of under $25 this is ideal to cover the rest of your contract period or if you are looking for a cheap functional phone.3. Having a functional keyboard on a phone smaller and lighter than my previous flip phone is a big plus. I can communicate by text almost as easily as someone with a smart phone.4. The battery life is good. I can go 3-4 days between charging, but I use the phone for mostly texting and minimal calling.5. Two sims feature. I've never used the two sims option, but this is hard to find and can be very useful if you are traveling or want to stop carrying two phones around.Negatives1. This phone works fine in a highly populated area.  When I am in the country in areas where my previous phone worked fine it struggles with reception.  The person talking to me breaks in and out or the call is dropped entirely.  And this is where there are 3 to 4 bars of reception.2. This phone only lets me store 50 contacts on the SIM card and only 100 on the phone. I'm not 100% sure, but I thought I could store more contacts on my SIM with my previous phone.3. This phone only lets contacts have a name and one phone number. Everyone I had an address stored previously is gone and anyone with multiple phone numbers I had to re-enter the second phone number as a separate contact.4. There is no easy way to backup contacts from the phone to the SIM and vice versa. You have to pick one place to store each.5. When you run out of space on the phone to store texts and they go over to the sim card all sent text messages will show up as 1/1/1970.  Received texts will still show up under the correct day.6. The phone only holds 50 texts and it restricts the SIM to 30. My previous basic flip phone held up to 256. When you run out of space you can send texts, but they won't be saved in the phone. For received texts the phone tells you there is a new text, but it won't let you see it.7. It takes 4 clicks to delete a text or you can delete all of them at once. Prior flip phones allowed me to select and delete many texts at once without deleting all of the texts in one go. This means every few weeks when I run out of space I need to either spend a lot of time deleting the oldest texts or just go and delete them all.8. There are two shift keys on the keyboard, but only one of them works. This is minor as I just use the other key.A couple of other notes about this phone1. The way to get to the main menu is completely illogical. It is they key between left arrow and call. Apart from that all the menus are self-explanatory.2. When using the phone with one SIM the message "Insert SIM" will be on the screen. This is normal and the phone will work fine.EDIT: After owning this phone for 4 months I'm changing to a 2 star because this phone can't make/receive calls in so many areas.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Maria "Maria"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son and he thought it was too small but my husband like it. the only problem with it is that there doesn't seem to be a way to lock the keyboard. It also took us a while to figure out how to put it on vibrate mode.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP!!!
Reviews.Author: Meralis
Reviews.Content: DOESN'T NOT WORK AT ALL.  THE WORST PHONE I EVER HAD.  INTERNET DOESN'T WORK.  SIM CARD IS NOT RECOGNIZE.  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: JC "James Brown"
Reviews.Content: work fine,  no complaints...bought two.one for my girl friends mother and a spare the I use since the ZTE quit

Reviews.Title: Good value, difficult to learn, no MMS
Reviews.Author: decline
Reviews.Content: I like the phone and it was a very good value but it does have some annoyances.I had to call tech support in order to learn how to find phone settings - the manual made absolutely no reference to how to get to that particular menu.MMS messages received (with pictures) cannot seem to be viewed.No convenient way to adjust volume while listening at the ear.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: keyla desde venezuela
Reviews.Content: excellent the phone is the same as the feature photo exposed by the same seller works very well in Venezuela is small and lightweight and even toy seems this phone is very adorable xD

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Shelia
Reviews.Content: My little nephew like this phone,This is the 2nd one i buy him,he lost the 1st one,He is happy so i am happy.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says on the tin
Reviews.Author: Kevin I
Reviews.Content: Perfect solution for someone with a need to keep in touch with more than one phone number.  Simple, cost-efficient and works well.

Reviews.Title: I like my new phone
Reviews.Author: kristi
Reviews.Content: It's just too bad that I cant send picture messages from it. It's also a bit smaller then I was expecting it to be, but I am still really enjoying it.
